short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your clinical documentation with AizaMD, the ultimate Chrome Extension to boost healthcare professionals' efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AizaMD is an AI-powered, voice-enabled Chrome extension designed to revolutionize how healthcare professionals handle documentation. Speak naturally to create precise SOAP notes with ICD-10 Codes, eliminating the need for manual data entry and seamlessly integrating into EHR. With Ambient Intelligence and machine learning, AizaMD offers real-time transcription for accurate, efficient patient records, enhancing the documentation process without the traditional paperwork hassle. With AizaMD, “forget the paperwork—remember patient care."

The tool simplifies clinical documentation into three straightforward steps: 

Step 1: Facilitates documentation through natural patient dialogue. AizaMD's Ambient Intelligence technology captures all details for precise record-keeping.

Step 2: Instantly convert your encounter into comprehensive SOAP Notes with ICD-10 Codes, reducing manual input and enhancing documentation efficiency.

Step 3 (A): Effortlessly integrate SOAP Notes into your current EHR system, simplifying patient record management and enhancing care quality.

Step 3 (B): Achieve universal EMR compatibility with AizaMD's Chrome extension, allowing seamless synchronization across different EMR systems for accessible and updated notes.

This process not only streamlines administrative tasks but also saves significant time each month, allowing healthcare professionals to focus more on patient interaction and care.

With AizaMD, a physician can potentially save **6 minutes per appointment,** doctors can accumulate up to **44 hours** of saved time each month. This translates into a considerable **550X return on investment** monthly. AizaMD not only saves time but also enhances the quality of interactions between doctors and patients. 

Designed for versatility, AizaMD is compatible across various devices, ensuring access and functionality wherever you are. We prioritize your data's security by being HiTrust certified and HIPAA compliant all patient information is safeguarded with the utmost standards. AizaMD is committed to adapting to your needs, learning from individual speaking styles and clinical practices for continuous improvement. Enhance your patient interaction with AizaMD—more eye contact, less keyboard contact."
